aeb36374-49d1-4204-ae3c-973a3d8bb91d.description: The objective of this course is for the student to demonstrate the knowledge and skills necessary to effectively plan, develop, execute, and close a Security Cooperation (SC) Case Letter of Offer and Acceptance (LOA) involving the partner nation and the United States Government.
